00030 namespace uStreamLib {
00043         class US_EXPORT ControlPin : public Pin {
00044         public:
00045 
00049                 ControlPin(void);
00050 
00054                 virtual ~ControlPin(void);
00055 
00064                 int32 init(Block* b, // parent block
00065                         uint32 bufsz, // preferred buffer size
00066                         uint32 bufcount, // preferred count of buffers
00067                         int32 queuesz   // queue size
00068                         );
00069 
00076                 int32 connect(Block* b, ControlPin* peer)
00077                 {
00078                         return Pin::connect(b, peer);
00079                 }
00080 
00087                 int32 disconnect(Block* b, ControlPin* peer)
00088                 {
00089                         return Pin::disconnect(b, peer);
00090                 }
00091 
00099                 int32 sendMessage(cmessage* m, int32 priority = 0);
00100 
00109                 int32 trySendMessage(cmessage* m, int32 priority = 0);
00110 
00117                 int32 recvMessage(cmessage* m);
00118 
00126                 int32 tryRecvMessage(cmessage* m);
00127 
00135                 int32 putMessage(cmessage* m, int32 priority = 0)
00136                 {
00137                         m->serial = _cmserial++;
00138                         return _iq.put((char *) m, sizeof(cmessage), priority);
00139                 }
00140 
00149                 int32 tryPutMessage(cmessage* m, int32 priority = 0)
00150                 {
00151                         m->serial = _cmserial++;
00152                         return _iq.tryPut((char *) m, sizeof(cmessage), priority);
00153                 }
00154 
00162                 int32 getMessage(cmessage* m)
00163                 {
00164                         return _iq.get((char *) m, sizeof(cmessage));
00165                 }
00166 
00175                 int32 tryGetMessage(cmessage* m)
00176                 {
00177                         return _iq.tryGet((char *) m, sizeof(cmessage));
00178                 }
00179         private:
00180                 /*
00181                  * Other constructors protected.
00182                  */
00183                 ControlPin(ControlPin&)
00184                 {
00185                 }
00186 
00191                 int32 init(char* name, // pin's name
00192                         uint32 bufsz, // preferred buffer size
00193                         uint32 bufcount, // preferred count of buffers
00194                         int32 queuesz   // queue size
00195                         );
00196 
00197                 /* input priority queue used to receive control messages */
00198                 PriorityQueue _iq;
00199 
00200                 /* control message serial counter */
00201                 uint32 _cmserial;
00202         };
